p: This in vitro investigation was carried out in NIH 3T3 cells, which is a cell line derived from mouse embryo fibroblasts. NIH 3T3 cells were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) supplemented with 5% fetal bovine serum and 1% antibiotics (penicillin and streptomycin). Preparation and quantization of HSV-1 were conducted as previously described ( Ding et al., 2012). Viruses were diluted in DMEM to a multiplicity of infection (MOI) of 0.1.
